title: Buying an EV? Hereâ€™s How to Prepare Your Home to Charge an Electric Car
sub_head: New electric-vehicle owners should plan ahead to determine their daily recharging routines
body:
Electric vehicles are gaining momentum. Sales of pure and hybrid plug-ins doubled in the U.S. last year to 656,866, according to data from electric-vehicle sales database EV-volumes, making up 4.4% of the passenger-vehicle market.
With more cars come more questions. Chief among them: how the recharging routine can work at home.
